description:
Harry is the typical entrepreneur explorer of new talent . Always with his red jacket and lit cigar , Harry ( George Burns , of  " Somebody up there likes me  " ) is a real temptation for young artists who seek success . For a  " super  " special precinho , he is able to turn anyone into a major star in  " Show Biz  " . And Bobby Shelton , a young musician capable of anything to gain fame, Harry would have  " fallen from the sky  " , but instead , the entrepreneur offers the poor inmescrupuloso Shelton ( Ted Wass ) another of his diabolical contracts . Hoping to attend a grand tour promoted by Gary Frantz ( Ron Silver ) , one big shot in the world of record labels , Shelton signed the contract immediately . However , just before leaving , he repents and decides to swap the glamor , the vanities and groupies of a big star , to be with the love of his wife Wendy ( Roxanne Hart ) . Shelton was deadlocked . And only with the elp of God he would find the solution for your case . The encounter between God ( George Burns himself ) and the Devil is an amusing game of poker in Las Vegas . Bet on MMA . George Burns gives a show of interpretation , showing everyone I talent and versatility , while playing the role of God and an evil businessman . The screenplay by Andrew Bergman ensures good - humor in the hilarious plot Heaven Waiting Continues . A comedy of hell .
